name: love me, love me not
description:
the first game made for my Game a Fortnight class !! this was made under the theme of "10 seconds or less" 

making this in 2 weeks meant that the code would be very dodgy so some of the elements like the timer are a bit suss- but i hope you enjoy it nonetheless !!

there's also an option to download the game if the browser version is giving you trouble!!

hope you like it !!

*theres a readme file that includes credit to some assets used to make the game!
